svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Global average CO₂ emissions per capita, measured in tonnes per person per year.
Source: Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Centre (CDIAC) and UN Population Prospects
